name: Fa Comment Rating
author: Rakib Hossain

sections.description:
The easiest to use rating option in comment! Fa Comment Rating plugin allows you to add a rating field in your comment from. Rating would be visible after comment content.

You can modify user comment rating by your dashboard comment screen.
sections.installation:
Thank you for choosing Comment Rating! In order to use rating in comment from, simply activate the plugin.

The field name, Comment Rating creates is ‘field’.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Thank you for choosing Comment Rating! In order to use rating in comment from, simply activate the plugin.

The field name, Comment Rating creates is ‘field’.

I installed the plugin but cannot see the rating field in comment from

This plugin will only add rating field for non register user.

short_description: Adds an awesome rating field in comment form.
description:
The easiest to use rating option in comment! Fa Comment Rating plugin allows you to add a rating field in your comment from. Rating would be visible after comment content.

You can modify user comment rating by your dashboard comment screen.

screenshots.caption: Default view of rating field is before submit button
You can inspect element to change default style and style as you like
Your custom css just paste in your thems style.css file
Admin can change rating from dashboard comment screen
